message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 8
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Grants
8
Convocatoria Erasmus+ estudios
(Europe regular ones or KA107 for outside)
o Some spots for PhD students.
o Duration depends on the destiny.
o Travel grant depends on the destiny (around 600e per month).
o Usually published around September.
o You contact someone in the host institution.
o Deadline: December of the preceding year.
speaker: SYSTEM
